item.title: MyWordNote
item.description: When i meet some word that I can’t known its meaning , i will record it here . Just for my convenience to remember how to write convenient 方便 adj convenience 方便 c layman 外行人 c term 期限，条约，条款，描述，术语，专业名词 in xxxx terms，对x
